import React from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import products from '../products'; import star from '../assets/star.png' type Props = {}; const Product = (props: Props) => { const { id } = useParams() const product = products.find((prod) => prod._id === id ) return product ? (

{product.name}

{product.rating}

Ratings {product.numReviews}

{product.numReviews} Sold

${product.price}

Quantity

Product Specifications

Category

Stock

Brand

{product.category}

{product.countInStock}

{product.brand}

Product Description

{product.description}

) : null }; export default Product;
